title: Why do so many White people have brown eyes? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Caucasian race is actually the most diverse race on the planet…no other race on this planet has so much variety. Black race has dark skin in different shades of dark, and brown eyes….( there are a very few instances of a gene variation with a blue colored eyes)….Asians have the Asiatic skin tone with brown eyes and straight black hair, etc…with each race of people being majority represented by one specific look… But Caucasian has hair color that ranges from black to light blonde and every color in between….with hair texture from super straight to curly , even kinky…with skin tone from pale white to Light and medium brown…with eyes Dark brown, brown, Hazel Blue, Hazel Green, Green and Blue…..indeed ..the most diverse race of people are Caucasian.

This is a very strange question. A more reasonable question would be, “Why are there some white people who DON'T have brown eyes?” Since eye color other than brown is a trait that is unique to white people.
